articles.title: France virus death toll goes beyond 23000 - Walcha News
articles.description: The number of people who have died from coronavirus infection in France has risen by 437 to 23,293, the health ministry says. The 1.9 per cent increase on Mon...
articles.content:
The number of people who have died from coronavirus infection in France has risen by 437 to 23,293, the health ministry says.
The 1.9 per cent increase on Monday is the highest in four days but well below the more than 4.0 per cent rate recorded 10 days ago.… [+267 chars]
